verses.name: Psalms 3:1
verses.text: Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.

verses.name: Psalms 3:2
verses.text: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 3:3
verses.text: But thou, O Lord, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.

verses.name: Psalms 3:4
verses.text: I cried unto the Lord with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 3:5
verses.text: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the Lord sustained me.

verses.name: Psalms 3:6
verses.text: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.
